title: When you try to play a bot match and end up with 9 bots instead of 5.

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: I'm absolutely certain I just played a bot match with 4 bots on my team. It was horrifying.

replies.body: Smegging hell, this sh!t again? Glad I'm putting my effort into Paragon rather than LoL now...
I mean this never stops because Riot don't give enough of a shit to stop it.
It's more of a "comes and goes" kind of thing. There are times when it's really bad and there are times when it's really good.

No it really isn't a comes and goes kinda thing.

At best sometimes it isn't 4 every game and is 2 every game, but it never goes to much more of an extent then that.

Before I stopped playing LoL, I was mostly into ARAM/Bots. I can most certainly assure you that it is more of a "comes and goes" kind of thing, ranging anywhere from 1 every 10 or so games (which, let's face it, is pretty much expected, things like this will never be 100% eliminated) to 3-4 every game, with the latter being a bit more uncommon.

Just so we are clear, Level 30 games of ARAM/Bots do not count.

Fact is at that point, an account is already right to be sold and is no longer being played by a bot.
The assumption being I only played on level 30 accounts...
I know right? This always happens to me. Especially in intermediate bots. They will always feed. I lost to bots onc because of this very reason
